It was such a great way to end our lesson on volcanos and these geodes impressed on their minds the amazing power of our wonderful planet. Everyone was happy with their geodes and were especially happy to take home their newly acquired gems from the earth!

These geodes were so cool! We got this kit for my son on his 11th birthday and he was not dissapointed in the least! He easily smashed most of them with a hammer. Just 2 of the bigger ones required a chisel and a hammer. They are beautiful! We didn't get a single dud!
almost every geode was white. I paid more for these because they were listed as having a variety of different colored Geodes.
reviews.review_header: almost every geode was white. I paid more for ...

reviews.review_text: My 7-year-old daughter was excited to break these and even more excited when she opened the package to discover that two of the geodes were really big. Unfortunately the large ones were extremely hard to break (it took an adult with a hammer 10 minutes for each one) and it turned out they were so difficult because they were SOLID. See photo. Not very fun to finally break open the largest geodes in the box only to find they have no crystals and are no better than your average rock. Felt a little jilted about that but she was still excited about the smaller geodes which the kids were able to break open fairly easily. Would have been nice to have gotten more variety on the crystal colors. My experience with kits like this is that most of the geodes have white crystals. This one had all white with 2 bluish. No pink, no purple. Took away a star for minimal color variety on the crystals and for giving us two big rocks.
reviews.review_header: Two biggest geodes were solid rocks!

reviews.review_text: Opening the geodes was fun for everyone kids and adults. However, it is only receiving 3 stars due to the lack of more "cool" geodes in the mix. You can tell what style of rock is inside the geodes from their outsides. They were mostly quartz with only 3 other rock types in each bag. I bought 2 packs of them and it seems like they are 70% quartz geodes and then 3 special geodes(cooler formations/color etc.)
reviews.review_header: Not as random as you would think.

reviews.review_text: Dear God PLEASE keep & expand Give A Mouse A Cookie series. Because i cannot possibly survive watching this same episode another 100 times in a row O.o
Even as an adult I think this is cool but sweet mother of god if I have to watch this episode another 17 times in a row I'm gonna fall apart. PLEASE RELEASE MORE EPISODES
reviews.review_header: I see applesauce in my nightmares

reviews.review_text: If your kids (or you) are a fan of this book, then you're going to want to watch this show. If you watch this show, you're going to like it. If you like it, you're going to look for more episodes. When you see there's only one episode so far, you're going to investigate how you can ensure more episodes are made. When you check into it, you're going to see that writing a review is a good idea. When you write the review, you're going to hope people read it, and you'll want to read others' reviews too. When you write and read reviews, that'll remind you that it's time to read a book with your kids. When you pull from your favorite stories, you're going to read "If You Give a Mouse a Cookie." And odds are, if you read "If You Give a Mouse a Cookie," your kids are going to want to watch this show, to go with it.
reviews.review_header: you're going to like it. If you like it

reviews.review_text: If you give a mouse a cookie, your daughter will become addicted. And when your daughter becomes addicted, mom searches for a relatable TV show. Enter this 11 minute episode and the 42 minute Christmas movie which my daughter watches on repeat and it's all she asks for. For the last six months we've been watching and every day I wake up hoping there are new episodes for the sake of being sane. Please release more episodes. Or make it a movie.

We absolutely love this show! My three-year-old daughter has watched the pilot episode dozens of times and recently asked me why it's only one. It's hard to explain to a child but I think I did my best I told her that a lot of people have to really really like it and then they will make more. She told me that we need to tell you how much we like the show so you will make more. Please make more so we don't have to watch the applesauce episode multiple times a day. This is such a cute concept for a show because it goes hand-in-hand with the books. I love the other characters in the show especially the pig and little girl because we also have the book if you give a pig a pancake. Kids can really identify with the shout if they have read the book. We have watched other Amazon pilot shows for kids and have liked several of them but not as much as this one. I think the animation is wonderful and reminds us of the animation in her book. Please please please pick up this show and give us more! Thanks!
reviews.review_header: We love this show, please make more!!

reviews.review_text: My 3 year old asks for new episodes constantly. Please, please, please release a full series. I'm allowing the Christmas special in the middle of summer because I'm tired of watching the same 1 episode 1000 times over.
reviews.review_header: Perfect show based off a great book. MORE PLEASE

reviews.review_text: I was looking for the story to be a straightforward reading of the book, not this which seemed to be a cartoon built around the story. I did not finish watching it so it may appeal to other people trying to entertain a young child. It just wasn't what I wanted.
reviews.review_header: Not what I was looking for

reviews.review_text: My 3 year old LOVES this episode!! We have a few of the books and he really likes reading them, but this cartoon is out-of-the-park adorable and we REALLY hope that more of these are made! The characters are super cute and very likeable, the scenes are great, the voices are very well matched to the characters, and there are so many opportunities for kids to learn about new items, actions, and animals through this series. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE MAKE MORE OF THESE!!
reviews.review_header: We LOOOOOOOOOVE this eposode! Please make more!!

name: The Noodley Children LED Finger Light Gloves - Black/White Boys Toys & Kids Games

reviews.review_text: These are AWESOME! Bought them for my 8yr old nephew and they fit perfectly. They work great and the colors are very vibrant. They come with an extra set of batteries too!! Great buy for young and old. Going to come in handy for Halloween too!

These are so amazing! These gloves are really cool and a really great value. The gloves light up and when you press the button on each hand the lights change to do several different variation with the lights and the colors. Noodley's not only ships the gloves with the batteries included, they even enclose additional batteries for when the included ones runs out...I mean how can you beat that value for $14.95? My 9 year old loves them and I find them to be fun as well. They fit her hands just fine with room to go. I definitely recommend these!!
reviews.review_header: These are so amazing! These gloves are really cool and a really great value.

reviews.review_text: I ordered a pair of these for my oldest grandson who is eight thinking they would be the least techy thing he would get for Christmas. When they arrived though I was so impressed with their quality and coolness, I promptly turned around and ordered four more pairs for the rest of my grandkids eBen though the youngest is only five months old. Even more impressive, they come loaded and ready to play in a wonderful gift box they can be stopped in AND four extra batteries to make them last the whole season. My grandson's love flashlights and I always have to keep a bazillion on hand, but this will make life soooo much better. Truly they are worth the $20 for each pair because they are that well made. Way to go Noodley gloves!!!!!

this things are great for the little ones, but the manufactures have to do some serious redesigning. kids cant get them off by themselves without pulling the inner glove out. seems to me just a little fabric adhesive would do the trick but i wouldnt want to say for sure cuz u never no how it will react with the inner circuitry. but some threading, something!! im sure if the manufacturer spent just a few days working on the issue they could come up with something. so i wont be buying another pair unti the issue is resovled and from what ive read im not the only one. if it wsnt for this issue i would have bought a pair for all 4 of my kids but we'll stick with just the one for now... good luck to the rest of you.
reviews.review_header: hard getting off without risking breaking them.

reviews.review_text: Bought these for a niece and nephew on their birthday (4 and 6 years old) and they loved them! Even the adults wanted to try them on and play in the dark. The kids gave me an extra special thank you call the day after their party. Grandma and grandpa said they wanted to do everything in those gloves and wouldnt take them off. I'd say that's a sucessful gift. I also asked a week later if they were still working on the same batteries and was told yes. There were quite a few settings on the gloves to chose from (every time u pressed the button again) like solid glow, strobbing, chosing only the tips to glow, or a certain color (as there are 3 colors per pair) or you could make them gradually fade into the next color. Now my sister wants 2 sets of her own to DJ with, lol. Fir adults, I think these might be cool for artistic spectacle or even for clubbers. For children, I like that the kids can go play in the yard at night and you can still keep an eye on them per their glowing hands.

My wife and I bought these for our niece for her 6th birthday, she loved them. The gloves fit as they should and were easy to use. They even came with an extra set of batteries. Good Product, Great Price, Hours of Fun. Thanks.

We bought these gloves for a birthday party for a 7-year-old. All the kids (and the parents) LOVED them!!! And the 7 different option of color changes made them that much more fun for everyone! An absolute must-buy for the price! I would definitely get them again!!

We had a couple issues with 3 pair of Noodley gloves bought for grandkids. Noodley emailed us right after delivery asking for any feedback. Told them of issues, but that we would not return gloves due to trouble to do so. The same day they issued us a full refund thru Amazon. We were not expecting that. This company means to have 100% satisfied customers. For that we give a 5 star rating. Below is our earlier review. Bought 3 pair of these according to the advertisers age/size recommendations. Kids size fit out 5 yr old good; he wears clothing 5/6. Kids size way way too small for our 8 year old; she wears clothing size 10. Teen size fit our 11 year old good he wears size 12 clothing. Also the red light in the right fourth fingertip of the teen gloves doesn't light up. The gloves are nicely made and fun for a while, for kids they fit, but 8 year old was dissapointed. Would not buy these again as not worth $15 / pair. Don't want the hassle of returning small size and one w/o red light back. Noodley did email us asking for feedback and said they want 100% customer satisfaction.
reviews.review_header: kids size are too small for 7+ year olds

name: AmazonBasics Low-Back Computer Chair - Red

reviews.review_text: So far this chair is excellent. Nice and thick cushion on the bottom and good back support. It only has height adjustment and is very basic, but it feels well made and it is comfortable. I switched from an executive chair that had the splitting fake leather (only 5 years old, not the best quality). I prefer a chair without arms so I can scoot up to the desk, and the mesh back is much more breathable. I use this AmazonBasics chair for programming and development. It's not the kind of chair you want if you like to lean back and consume media on your computer, but for computer tasks it is great. I use a similar chair 8 hours a day at work, but it isn't as good as this one. I may replace it with this chair as well.

This chair is perfect for use at my sewing machine...I don't need a lot of padding or expensive features. I use it in my sewing room, which has industrial-type carpeting, and the chair rolls around fine but never gets away from me. It has a seat back that encourages good posture. You couldn't buy a chair from a store this good, and though I hated buying such an item without actually being able to sit in it, this one is pretty (red!) and very comfortable.

My parents decided to purchase an office chair for my husband and I. We are both in college and were desperate for a functional and inexpensive office chair. I did some searching and came upon this one. The reviews sold me! We have had this chair for a month. It took 10 minutes to put together, with the help of two kids under 5, and it is very comfortable. The wheels move with smooth fluidity, the chair cushion is very comfortable, and the back of the chair provides ample support. The seat height adjusts easily as well. I am pregnant with our third child and back support is what we were definitely lacking with our other chair. This one does the job! Don't hesitate to get it. The green is beautiful, and it is a high quality chair with an excellent price range. I got a floor protector to go under it because it sits on wood floors.
reviews.review_header: and it is very comfortable. The wheels move with smooth fluidity

reviews.review_text: It took me (a 70-year old woman) less than five minutes to put this together. It is comfortable and lightweight -- every bit as nice as the Aeron chair I used have in my old office at work. And certainly a lot less. $39.99 for this chair is a steal.

This is a surprisingly comfortable desk chair. It comes in one box that contains five wheels, a hub, pneumatic lift, seat and back. Everything you need to put this together is in the box, including the 4 screws and allen wrench. The plate the goes on the base of the chair is imprinted with the word "FRONT" on it and it will face the lable that says "FRONT" which is glued to the bottom of the seat. Screw in the plate, put it on top of the hydrolic lift and You're done. It is lightweight but solid. Rolls wonderfully easy and is really comfortable. I have one office with just a straight back folding chair and this is like having a limo by comparison. This chair is a very functional chair with a very doable price.
reviews.review_header: Comfy desk chair that's easy to assemble, and a great value

reviews.review_text: If I had tried sitting in this chair at a brick and mortar store, I probably would not have bought it. I bought it to use while machine sewing and it's okay. It was easy to assemble - I did it in about 5 or 6 minutes. It rolls pretty good, the back gives pretty good support but the seat is not as comfortable as I would like it to be. If I sit in the chair over 45 minutes, when I stand up my backside kind of hurts. I'm 65 years old and really like to sew, so this chair will get a lot of use, but I will need to space out how long I sit at one time. It came well packaged, the instructions were easy to read, and it was cheap enough. If you are looking for a chair that you will sit in a lot, you might want to go with a higher end purchase.

Great little chair, and I do mean little. It is best for a smaller person. I am 5' 11" 180 pound and it is fine with me but my daughter who is 5' 6" 100 lbs fits a lot better on it. Also, it has enough padding, contrary to what others say. I guess it matters how much "natural" padding you begin with in your backside.
This is a great desk chair for my son. It's very good quality. I would purchase again. And very simple to put together in just a couple steps!

name: Kids Backseat Organizer Holds Crayons Markers an iPad Kindle or Other Tablet. Great for Road Trips and Travel used as a Lap Tray Writing Surface or as Access to Electronics for Kids Age 3+

reviews.review_text: So this review is based on 9 months of constant use by my 8 year old daughter. I bought two of these--one for each of my kids--for a long road trip. My older child used his for the trip but hasn't used it much since. My daughter keeps her permanently installed and uses it every time we are in the car. I would rate this product three stars except for the fact that it is the only thing I found like it so there aren't really a lot of other options. It does have some pretty major flaws though. First of all, it is not wipable and the fabric is not water proof so any spill soaks through to whatever board it is lined with--probably a heavy cardboard. It is the nature of kids to spill anything that is remotely spillable so her tray is predictably gross and stained and there's not a thing I can do about it. See photo. That's just a basic ice cream spill (and probably a drink or two. Who knows. LOL). The other most annoying design issue is that it's pretty hard to zip closed because the zipper pull is short and gets stuck way back in a crease. So it's not an easy thing to close it away when you want to get out of the car. We have basically given up on closing it so it's just always in the way. But on the plus side, she does use it a lot and it helps her do the many things she wants to do while we are driving. With as much time as we spend in the car, this is helpful. Not sure how much longer it will hold up. For the price I'm hoping for at least a year of use.

Great concept, unrealistic design, at least for our SUV. We had high hopes for a big road trip, went to attach the organizer, cinched the straps as tight as they can go and the when the table is folded down, it's a solid 6" below the kids knees. We have 1 in a booster and one in a car seat, both are positioned way to high for this product to be functional. The table is at an extreme "downward" angle, impossible to be used. Unfortunately, we purchased these 2 months prior to our April road trip and the "return window" has expired, we are stuck with some expensive and poorly designed organizers and can't imagine any vehicle these could work on. A better design would be a MUCH smaller version, these are huge.
reviews.review_header: Great concept, unrealistic design for an SUV

reviews.review_text: This review comes after a coast to coast drive across the US. This product has great potential, however it is lacking in a few areas, which really brings down the rating for me. The backseat organizer was useful and provided a space for the kids to play, eat, and do homework assignments. It kept everything, for the most part, fairly organized, which was nice. Like others have stated, the zipper really is cheap. It is very difficult to zip up and constantly gets hung up in both directions. The kids were very frustrated by this. The tab on the zipper also broke within 30 days of use. The handle used to attach the organizer to the backseat could use a little more reinforcement, or an entirely different design. In order to make sure it was at the correct height for my children I had to cinch it down quite a bit, which really pulled on the material, and ultimately the strap tore away from the organizer. I think this probably would have happened over time anyway, just because of the stress on the strap when attached to the seat. It pulls regardless of the amount of pressure. In order to use it again, I will have to sew the strap and find a way to reinforce it so it doesn't come apart again. After all, did it serve it's purpose? Yes. However, I would've liked to see this as more of a long term accessory to our road trip adventures. Overall, I love the idea, I like the product, I just wish it was a little more durable.

I got these for our kids before a long car ride, and filled them with new writing implements and activity/coloring books. They were a hit. FYI: My 7 year old (front facing booster seat) could zip and unzip it easily. My nearly-4 year old (front facing 5 harness) couldn’t really zip it yet so I had to reach back and do it for her. She will probably be able to do it herself in another year. I love how easy it was to close up when we stopped and got out of the car. I’d tried the lap desks before but they were such a pain to dig my child out from under, at each rest stop. This was much easier. My once concern is that the straps may tear off after a while. Definitely can’t make it too heavy. However, so far, so good. I will update when/if they tear.
reviews.review_header: Easy, functional and kids loved it

reviews.review_text: I originally bought something from Walmart that I thought would work for my 4 year old son and it was horrible. You couldn't use it to color or play with and a waste of 12$. I saw this floating through my feed on Facebook and clicked and then went to Amazon and ordered this. We drive 6 and a half hours to go visit my husband every three weeks where he is working and 6 and a half hours back. My son loves this. Uses it to color on as well as play with his cars in the car. And he stores his kindle in it. Definitely a must have if you go on long trips.
reviews.review_header: Love. You need it if you drive a lot with young kids

reviews.review_text: Wasn't overly thrilled with these, especially for the price (having to buy two). They didn't strap around my seats well and they were a bit too far away from the kids. I have a minivan so maybe that's the problem..? But you are usually in one of those for road trips. The worse problem was that zipper. It was really hard to zip close. Kids definitely could not do it and I broke off three pulls trying to zip close. Very dissapointing

great idea, unfortunately it doesn't work for our minivan or SUV cheap zipper, gets struck in the crevices and kids can't get it zipped back up by themselves which causes a lot of whining and frustration which is exactly what we are trying to avoid on long road trips. the height and distance from the seat for most cars makes it not really work. the size might work for tiny cars, but our minivan and SUV the seats are too far away from the seats in front. the height is fine if the kid is not in a booster seat. but we have 3 kids in booster/carseats and they are too high up, the desk lays at an angle so it didn't work.
reviews.review_header: great idea, unfortunately it doesn't work for our minivan or SUV

name: Singing Machine SML385UW Bluetooth Karaoke System with LED Disco Lights, CD+G, USB, and Microphone, White

reviews.review_text: So far, lots of fun for the money. here's something I didn't see on the product description or in other reviews that you might find helpful: I would recommend getting a 1/8" (3.5mm) Stereo Cable (9.99 at Radio Shack, probably cheaper if you shop online, but I didn't know I needed it..) that will connect most personal audio devices--including iphone, ipod, and ipad to the Signing Machine via the Audio IN (marked only by a musical note) spot in the back of the machine next to the spot where the video OUT cables attach. This is a cool because it: 1) enables you to skip the purchase of tons of karoyke CDs, especially those your kids will demand today, but never listen to again by next month 2) plug in your Ipad and use the zillions of karaoke song/video lyrics that can be found on YouTube 3) plug in your Mp3 or iphone--especially if you have a streaming service --and find virtually any karaoke recording you could ever want and blast it through the singing machine. My next project is to use the chromecaster so that the YouTube karaoke lyrics can be broadcast on the TV, because now the lyrics only scroll on the ipad, not the TV. this is a small tradeoff though because YouTube is providing a vast karaoke library without purchasing lots of CDs, some of which will fall out of favor with the group. It's best to turn the ipad volume all the way up in order to get maximum sound. One other thing, especially for little kids, that makes this cable a good idea----the songs that little kids often want to sing from their favorite recording artists are difficult--it's not the worst thing in the world to sing along WITH their favorite recordings--the mike easily enables the child's voice to boom over the singer's voice...but the singer is there for a guide; it's hard for little kids and even some adults to follow scrolling lyrics. OK so this may not be pure karaoke, but I bought this to entertain the kids, so I'm not a stickler for karaoke rules :-) If you get this stereo cable, you are REALLY upgrading a relatively inexpensive karaoke model !
reviews.review_header: Great Machine, & get a 1/8" Stereo Cable for MUCH MORE MUSIC AND VERSATILITY

reviews.review_text: Glad I am testing this thing out before Christmas. There is no way to hear the voice from the microphone. As a former audio engineer, I have a pretty good knowledge of how to turn knobs for volume control and hook up a mic. If one person puts their mouth on the mic while singing and the other puts an ear right up to the speaker, you can faintly hear that something is coming from the mic. What a piece of junk. Hope Amazon will give me a full refund.
reviews.review_header: Can you hear me now? No!

reviews.review_text: This stupid machine has not worked since the day we got it. I bought this for Christmas for my daughter. The machine will not recognize a cdg disc and hasn't worked since the day we got it. I have been in a loop with the Singing Machine customer service and they will not resolve and have been less than helpful trying to get this defective machine replaced. I am at the point of just throwing this $40 away and starting over. This is ridiculous.
reviews.review_header: Miserable product and miserable customer service

reviews.review_text: My child loves to sing and this was the perfect gift!!!! For sure spend the extra $10 and get the Bluetooth version of this! Pair your machine to your device and sing the night away. Use YouTube to get music with lyrics, no need to buy CD. I use Chromecast to view iPad on my big TV! Such an great time for all the family.

When I initially got it in the mail, I was worried it would be broken from being transported. So even though it is a Christmas gift, I opened it to ensure nothing was wrong. I bought it for my 7 year old sister, and I guarantee she WILL LOVE IT! The machine works perfectly (as far as I could tell) and the sound quality is great! I give this item a 5 star, but they really outdid themselves for the price!!

Great quality for the price! Bought for my three year old twins and they love it. Bought the extra microphone to go with it so they wouldn't have to share. The microphones slide down these little holders on the side and the first day we had it, a screw came out so the holder won't work. (Can totally be replaced, but was slightly annoyed considering we had owned it a total of two hours). Overall good product. The blue tooth quality isn't the best (the music goes in and out a bit) but I do enjoy the fact that I can hook up my iPod to it. If you are strictly using the CDs, the sound is great.

This singing machine has a female DC power connector on the back. It's the kind with the round power connector like you find on laptops, small televisions, and many other electronics. The female power connector on the machine was poorly soldered and broke off after 5 months of use. Now it's totally useless.

This is the second version of this product we have purchased - both have suffered the same flaw - the power adapter plug breaks where it connects to the back of the machine. This product is poor quality

name: CamelBak eddy Kids 12oz Water Bottle

reviews.review_text: I seriously love these sippy cups! I see reviews for how moldy they get. Mine do too but I purchased dr. Browns bottle brushes. They are very slim so they fit in the spouts and the straw. Plus I learned if I wash their cups daily and use the little brush on the straws and spouts they never mold... ever! The spouts split... ok. So does every other rubber spout my kids have had. It's because they use their teeth. They seriously still work great! I have been using them for two years now. I always want to get more but I guess 14 (5 have gone missing through daycare and travel) is way more than enough! Seriously. Just wash them with the tiny brush and all works great. All photos I have included are of bottles I have had for 1-2 years. Same with the spouts. They are all just as old and still super clean!
reviews.review_header: I seriously love these sippy cups

reviews.review_text: I bought three of these bottles for my daughters, and they absolutely love them. Nice and big with fun designs and easy to drink from. BUT... 50% of the time, a few minutes after they put them down on a surface, I find the bottle sitting in a pool of water or juice that has leaked out of the bite valve at the top. All the surfaces in their playroom are slowly getting ruined with watermarks! I presume it wouldn't leak so much if they made sure to push it closed every time they've finished drinking, but my kids just can't remember to do that... Seems like it's something to do with the liquid inside warming up and the pressure pushing it up the straw and out of the bottle. It's a real design flaw, and it would be great if Camelbak could take the time to look into why it's happening so often and try and redesign the valve so it doesn't happen.
reviews.review_header: Great graphics and design but... IT LEAKS! Camelbak need to fix this flaw!

reviews.review_text: This is another brand that I do not mind spending a little more on due to the quality. There are so many reviews claiming that these bottles are a "health hazzard" Seriously, just clean your children's cups (regardless of the brand) with warm soapy water, give the crevices a little scrub every so often and you'll be just fine. I love that they have so many options in colors and patterns to choose from. My daughter gets so excited with each new cup she gets. (which is quite a few, since you can NEVER have enough sippie cups, right?
reviews.review_header: PERFECT SIPPY!!! I need all the colors and patterns!

reviews.review_text: I love these for my toddler. I am a believer that no sippy cup out there is "immune" from mildew and mold growth and thought this would be better than others because all the pieces easily come apart. However, where this is prone to mildew growth is very difficult to clean, imo. And I don't use these for anything but water. The mouth piece needs to have an easier design for cleaning and prevention or should come with a special tool to get in there.

I’m a big fan of Camelbak bottles, have been using them for years, and when my son started wanting to always drink from the same bottle as mommy and daddy, thought it was fantastic that he could have his own! Too bad though, that there is a flaw in this bottle that makes it a bad choice for a little kid. The bite valve can be pushed in, opening a hole, allowing the liquid inside to just flow out. For that reason, I have to drop it a couple stars. Good product, but not designed for the kids this is sold for.

I love this bottle! The first one I purchased was a complete lemon. It would leak leak LEAK! the valve and straw were defective. I contacted amazon and they sent me a replacement. This one is AWESOME! We have had it almost a year now. My daughter loves drinking from it. We just bought a replacement valve because my daughter loves to stick her tiny fingers into the valve opening and after months of doing that, it tore open. But that has to do with her, not the actually bottle. I would highly recommend this for kids. Very durable bottle.

After using so many different brands of water bottles, this seems to be the winner for our household. My kid was a biter so a few of the other brands she chewed teeth marks into the plastic spouts deeming unsafe to use. This one is silicone and soft so it's not as easy to damage with those sharp little teeth. It's a little more work to take everything apart and wash. Just saw there's a special brush you can purchase to clean the inside. The exterior of the bottle itself will eventually scratch with drops and toddler abuse but it's still quite sturdy and good quality. My almost 1 year old just started sipping from this too and found it easier than actual sippy cups because she didn't have to lift the bottle up.
reviews.review_header: Sturdy and good quality water bottle for toddlers

reviews.review_text: The only thing I like about this water bottle is the cute design. Otherwise, it is a terrible product! My 1 year old is constantly soaked due to the valve leaking all the time. I can't count the number of times the straw has become dislodged and the valve pushed on, causing the contents to spill out. Luckily, we only put water in it but it's still such a pain. Look elsewhere unless you'd prefer to have your child on a constant self-cleaning cycle.

name: Garmin vívofit jr, Kids Fitness/Activity Tracker, 1year Battery Life, Real Flower

reviews.review_text: For a while my 9 year old daughter had been wearing a regular adult Garmin tracker and it was comically big on her wrist. It's great that Garmin has put out a JR version of their tracker, and it's more than just smaller. Garmin vivofit JR provides a lot of features which are easily accessed through a single function button. Perhaps MOST importantly it actually tells the time. There are so many fitness trackers out there which don't seem to care about the time! It also has: a stop watch, a chore tracker, task timers (like for brushing your teeth), minutes active tracking, step tracking, and a coin system for doing chores. All this is linked to a parent controlled app which was very easy to set up and get working. The band is well sized for our 9 year old and the tracker is water proof. It's great to see a company tailor their product for kids and not just re-size it, but customize the whole experience (including being able to have your kids name on the time!). My daughter loves it, and it motivates her to keep moving.
reviews.review_header: More Than Kid Sized - Kid Focused Design

reviews.review_text: I bought this for my 8 year old's birthday two weeks ago. The Garmin Vivofit Jr. is more amazing then I expected! The day after her birthday, I was ordering a Vivofit Jr. for my 5 and 10 year old children. Each child is really into all the functions, steps taken, daily activity time, chores complete, coins received, the timers and stop watch. Before bed, my children like to read the trail, the next clue or animal. We have sat down as a family to design rewards. On Fridays, if they have earned enough coins, they can receive their allowance or bank coins for other rewards. My five year old is learning higher numbers and reading time. My 8 and 10 year old have asked to use the treadmilll (rainy days) or go for bike rides to meet daily goals. They are really excited when they have doubled, even tripled, their daily activity goals. Their chores are done quicker (and correct), they are asking for more ways to help around the house. As a teacher, best educational practice is to have students set their own goals and identify their consequences (positive and negative). The Vivofit Jr. allows us to do this with easy management and quick feedback. I wish there was an immediate, affordable system for tracking positive behavior like this which I could use in school with my students. When my mom friends and teacher friends have seen the watches and the app, they have purchased Vivofit Jrs. for their children. My children's friends are asking their parents for ones. It is great the Vivofit Jr. fits bands for the Vivofit 3. As they get older it will not look childish with a replacement band. I write very few reviews. This is such a cool product with useful, practical functions, I needed to write a review.

My 10 year old son loves this thing. I was hesitant to purchase because I felt it was very expensive for a child. I love the free app that allows us to track his progress as well as establish chores and rewards. Makes it a little easier to get some help around the house lol. I'd highly recommend this product to anyone with a smaller child. Its water resistant, he never takes it off.
reviews.review_header: I love the free app that allows us to track his ...

reviews.review_text: This has been THE BEST addition to our home this year. I was a little hesitant to purchase these watches. When a friend told me her kids still loved their watches after 2 months, I went ahead and got them for my own kiddos. It's been wonderful. My kids now compete to earn points by doing chores etc. They beg for more chores or tasks to do when they are close to hitting a point goal. I love that it's controlled by an app on my phone, and that I can edit the rewards and chores. My kids love the timers for brushing teeth and cleaning, the piggy bank on the watch that tells you how many coins you have earned, and competing with each other to climb the trail if they hit 60 minutes of activity each day. I love that you don't have to charge this watch, and that it's completely water proof. It survived beach trips and a summer in the pool. We have had ours about 6 months and have had no issues. This watch does have it all. It's a must for parents with little ones. I even have parents of my school students get them and we work together to reward effort in class. I can't say enough positive things about this watch.
reviews.review_header: This is a MUST for anyone with young kids.

reviews.review_text: I have never felt the need to give reviews till now. You could call this venting out , not arguing but I do want people to think twice before they put in their hard earned money ..On this expensive product. ..$79 !!! Yes I consider it expensive. But I was impressed with its offering and ordered it in May '17 as a gift for my 9yr old daughter. We were delighted with the product though I was lightly disappointed by the screen size .It fit her wrist and she was happy. It was easy to pair and set the chores. The software was novel though there is lot of room for improvement . 2 months, though we didn't explore all the features it was going well. 3rd month, we saw a big blob on the screen and I was mad. I was kicking myself that I should have read more reviews to see if it's common and knew it was beyond the period for return or refund . 4th...The last straw...The strap broke ..My kid was so heartbroken and I'm terribly disappointed. C'mon Garmin ...Seriously !!! U make a product for kids and that too for $79 and what were u thinking....The first thing should be it's durability with their band...Why aren't they even giving a yr warranty for it...And then come.external screen which I think again has to endure the wear and tear....Can't imagine it on boys , especially very active boys. Yes, I know they have screen guard and I made a mistake of not spending another $8 to do that.... And what's with that big black blob on the screen.....In just few mths ?? I wish I had thought through before getting this product.
reviews.review_header: My first negative report on Amazon....i'm not vine reporter but I'm prime member who uses and buys through Amazon regularly

reviews.review_text: Fantastic product! Within a day my kids' activity levels have increased 1000% because they have a goal to meet. They have to earn tablet time which has been a constant battle (with us adults usually giving in). I bought this one for my 11 year old and the only complaint was that the band was too small. I found another company that sold replacement bands and it fit right in.

name: Kids Bath Bombs Gift Set with Surprise Toys, 6x5oz Fun Assorted Colored XL Bath Fizzies, Kid Safe, Gender Neutral with Organic Essential Oils -Handmade in the USA Organic Bubble Bath Fizzy

reviews.review_text: My husband is in the Army and he had to go away early this morning for training so I bought these for my almost five year old daughter for tonight to keep her mind off of Daddy being gone. The wrapping and the box are so pretty!, as soon as Rachel opened the box I smelled them and they smelled amazing even wrapped. The colors are gorgeous. Fast forward-I unwrapped one for her bath and the color was so vibrant!!!, the toy was so cute, it was a good size toy she will actually play with too and the smell was so wonderful. We just bought our first home ever in 16 years and we have a really big bathroom I still smell the wonderful smells, way better than any candles I’ve ever purchased!, these bathbombs are by far the best bath bombs I have ever bought in my entire life!, I am so impressed. Please don’t hesitate to buy these they are amazing. My daughter somehow talked me into using three tonight!! We love them!!, Thank You

son loves them they do not stain the tub they all smell wonderful and these are an excellent value compared to other brands because you get 6 the pokemons are quite small tho my son just lines them up on a shelf so they are more decoration than toy I don't know that I'd expect them to be played with and I wouldn't let any toddlers or kids prone to putting thing in their mouths near them.

Love these!!! Love that they are organic, vegan, cruelty free. They are HUGE and smell so good. They make our son’s bath water SO colorful. The little toys inside are super cute. The box they come in is great to give as a gift, as they are packaged very nicely inside, individually wrapped. Love the scents and that each one comes with a cute quote on the wrapper. Will purchase again for sure.

These are amazing! Forget buying them for kids, get them for yourself! We've had so much fun with these. The toys inside are quite small, so make sure if you do get them for a kiddo, these are age-appropriate. My sandshrew is probably an inch tall. Then again, I'm not the best with measurements.

My 10 yr old girl loves these, she can't get enough. Even my son who's older asked to have one. Both kids loved the bath bombs. Water turns a bright color, fizzes awesome,smells great, and a cute little toy appears. These are worth not begging my kids to take their baths they are begging to take a bath twice a day😂
reviews.review_header: Both kids loved the bath bombs

reviews.review_text: The fragrance was too strong for my family and me.

I bought these for myself because, hey, a bath bomb with nothing inside is just a little depressing. The toys are cute (and really small). One I bought had a broken ear, but that stuff happens. If you're considering these, just get them. They are cute, smell nice, and are fun. Make sure you rinse the tub after or you may have a ring on the especially bright ones. CAUTIONARY: These arrived sorta messy. The balls were not wrapped really well so there was "bath dust" on the package. DON'T order these with anything edible or something that can't be cleaned off, because my guess is that's common. Other than that, they are great. They also come in a larger set with smaller balls, which I am trying next. Really do enjoy them.
reviews.review_header: Fun, Smell Nice, Don't Order with Edible Items

reviews.review_text: Bought this for my 9 year old son. He loves baths and tries to steal my LUSH bath bombs. Bought them for Xmas. I'm a LUSH snob, so I didn't expect much. WOW was I wrong. The smells from the box......amazing!!!! He could smell the bombs through the wrapping paper. The most delicious smells !!! And the tiny pokemon toys in each bomb are adorable. He loved these bombs, and this time around I was the jealous one trying to steal HIS bombs. I will most definitely be ordering my own big girl box. Hands down, an excellent product.

name: Kids Washable Makeup Set With A Glitter Cosmetic Bag

reviews.review_text: Very lightweight, very Dollar Store Style Packaging and contents. Cute but the most I would pay would be about five bucks!
Kit was exactly as advertised and came in a nice silver makeup case. My daughter loved it until it made her skin break out so badly it burned.
reviews.review_header: Made my daughter's skin break out

reviews.review_text: The lids to the compact powders are very difficult to open for an adult much less a child. Lids to all the powdered compacts broke upon initial opening. Now we're having to keep the broken ones in a sandwich bag to prevent the rest of the makeup bag from getting powder on everything. So disappointed.

This was marketed as being for an older age group but my 2-year-old daughter loves it. I knew she wouldn't be happy with the kid makeup that has just foam inside the containers instead of real product. Just a word of warning that the nail polish doesn't wash off easily like the other stuff. My kid has nail polish on her legs right now, haha.

My two year old loves playing with this. It keeps her out of my makeup and happy while I get ready! Mostly she just opens and closes everything. It washes off easily if she does try it on. The bag it came with isn't the best but I just used another one we had.
reviews.review_header: It keeps her out of my makeup and happy while I get ready

reviews.review_text: I think the picture is little deceiving. Maybe it is mentioned in the details but there isn't as much make up as pictured in the photo. Still fun to play with but I do wish the bag would've been little more full. I feel like I got "Dollar Store" worth quality and quantity.
reviews.review_header: Still fun to play with but I do wish the bag ...

reviews.review_text: Bought this for my daughter. She loves to take my makeup so her daddy found this online. She loved it, took it everywhere with her. As time went by she lost it but she hasn’t gotten a rash or anything (she has sensitive skin). Ps. I do NOT recommend putting the lipstick in the eye brows like my boyfriend did to my daughter, hardest thing to get out of a moving toddler! Lol

My daughter loves this but the "washable" claim is false. I have used actual makeup remover wipes and still couldn't get all of the color off. Had to scrub with washcloth and soap, and I was expecting to be able to use a baby wipe or wet wipe. You are better off hitting up the dollar store for a cute bag and some cheapo makeup.

name: idoot Magnetic Blocks Building Set for Kids, Magnetic Tiles Educational Building Construction Toys for Boys and Girls with Storage Bag - 56pcs

reviews.review_text: This is a really neat set and there's a lot of cool things you can do with it! But after only 24 hours one has broken. Unlike similar sets, these have no rivets holding the tiles together. So when one got dropped, it just broke open and the magnets fell out. This is really unsafe for anyone with little ones running around. Wonderful concept but really needs rivets or another better way of keeping the tiles together.

We own a small set of magformers that I wanted to add to. I bought this site based off the reviews and reasonable price. I'm glad I did. I can't tell the difference between the originals and this brand. My kids use them together.
reviews.review_header: Just like the more expensive brand

reviews.review_text: These were a gift for my 12 yr old grandson who is totally addicted to computer and PS4 games. I thought he would offer his polite thank you and not pick them out of the box. Holy cow!!! I'm very delighted that he loves them so much that the PS4 wasn't touched for the next six hours. He even took them to a high school graduation celebration and stopped long enough to eat! Amazing product and terrific way to exercise the mind in a non-techy way!!!! I purchased these in a lightning deal but would be happy to buy more sets even if the cost was higher. Absolutely positively a fantabulous find‼️‼️
reviews.review_header: Got my grandson to put the PS4 down!!!!

reviews.review_text: GREAT to keep in the car - the bag they come in is perfect. They provide so much entertainment for road trips....that I now just keep them in the car for regular day-to-day traffic.
reviews.review_header: GREAT to keep in the car - the bag they ...

reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised at this building block set!, creative. And yet entertains the littles even if they aren't engineers. We've spent several hours playing with this set, and it has challenged me to complete a specific design, but my husband figures them out very easily. Strong magnets, pack neatly bright colors. Excellent stocking stuffer if you're looking for ideas.

I bought these for preschoolers. However, teens and adults are enjoying them just as much. This is a product I would purchase again and again. The quality is great. It comes with an idea guide to help those who are little more intimidated to use their imagination at first.

LOVE these magnets! Purchased for 3 and 4 year old kids. They immediately threw them all up on the fridge and started building sideways houses. They're still played with frequently two months after purchase and because they're all on the fridge, even my older kids sometimes play with them. I do wish they were a tiny bit more affordable but overall, I'm definitely pleased with my purchase and would purchase again!
Wow! My son loves this!!! Check it out my pix below. I don't know why there are ppl saying this is bad quality but my son LOVE this set badly!

name: Simple Joys by Carter's Baby and Toddler Boys' 3-Pack Loose Fit Fleece Footed Pajamas

reviews.review_text: I bought (these three at $25) size 12m for my giant 6 month old-(he went from 9 mo to 12 mo clothes in about two weeks 😳) he's 28.5 inches tall and a little over 20 lbs-they fit exactly as expected. These DO NOT have any funky smell at all; they're soft, thick-but not ridiculously thick, are not tight around the neck or wrists, have a zipper with snap closure at the top. I do agree with another reviewer that the legs are a bit more narrow as compared to the chest and waist, but they aren't too tight; My boy isn't very chunky, so that wasn't an issue but if you have a Buddha Baby, the legs might be too tight. The designs are bright and even cuter than the pictures-I really love the race car print. You can't go wrong with Carter's or any Carter's related brand...this is my third boy and I've had ALL KINDS of clothes on them...from super expensive name brands (bought by family members and friends and coincidentally they all rip quickly, don't fit properly, are uncomfortable or are just plain ugly) to "less expensive" clothes from Old Navy, Osh-Kosh, Carters, Garanimals, Just One You, Simple Joys and Jumping Beans......Carters (and JOY/SJ), Garanimals and Jumping Beans are (in my opinion) hands down the best fitting, most comfortable and most well made.
reviews.review_header: The designs are bright and even cuter than the pictures-I really love the race car print

reviews.review_text: Love the feel of them. Keeps temp great, real soft on inside also. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that one leg is tough to get in and major negative to me on footies is the foot size is small needs to be bigger for more comfort. May have to cut off feet of suit soon to still keep comfort and not squish toes and top of foot. Please make future ones with bigger foot size. Loving brand so far.
reviews.review_header: Wonderful feel inside and out. Small foot size in bootie though.

reviews.review_text: So soft! Also gives me peace of mind that my baby is staying warm. Not sure on the fit because I have a big boy! I bought 18 month for my 6 month old and they fit great. He is wearing 12-18 month in everything else if that helps.

My daughter didn't want my to buy the pink version, but she saw these and said "aliens and cars and dinosaur! Yay!!!" As soon as they arrived and were washed we put them on and she said "these are as soft as a beaver!" though she's never even seen a live beaver, let alone felt one, so you can just take that as they are very soft and comfy lol

Love! I was hesitant to buy because I have never been impressed with the Carter's line at Wal-Mart and typically just stick with the original Carter's. These were so soft, I'd almost say they are slightly softer and thicker than the original line and the fit is the same. Their pjs do run small. My son is in 2t/3t but solid 4t on pjs.
reviews.review_header: Love! I was hesitant to buy because I have ...

reviews.review_text: Well, these things are rad. Carter's quality, friggin' adorable and, so far, holding up well. Bought for my 5 year old because she can't keep a blanket on to save her life. Now she refuses to take them off as long as she has a clean pair. That really only becomes a problem when we have to, ya know.. leave the house, though. They -are- footie pajamas, though. If you're about to buy these thinking that 15 or 20 or 30 years of footie pajama technology have somehow managed to make the bottoms of the feet less slippery... oh boy, are you wrong. Your kid's still gonna eat it if they take off running on a smooth floor in these.

The Simple Joy clothing line does a great job at providing cute, durable baby clothes at a reasonable cost. With baby number 2 I do a heck of a lot more shopping on Amazon. I truly appreciate having a go-to baby brand at my fingertips. Simple Joys is my first option when I need the next size up on clothing staples, like baby pajamas or toddler tees. These fleece pajamas are soft to the touch and have cute designs with bright colors. They are durable and easy to clean. My one year old is in the 95th percentile for height and the 18 month size fit him well. I highly recommend these pjs!

Super cute and cozy PJs. They run true to size but I did find these PJs to be tighter in the legs and feet (thickness, length seems fine) than regular Carter’s PJs. If you have chunky legged babies they might be a little bit of a struggle to pull on but are otherwise a great deal!
reviews.review_header: Tight in the legs and feet

name: Adoric 361 Night Lamp, Star Light Rotating Projector, 4 LED Bulbs 8 Modes for Children Kids Bedroom (3.2FT USB Cord)
Creativity for Kids Hide and Seek Rock Painting Kit - Spread Kindness and Customize 10 Rocks

reviews.review_text: I ordered this for my year old Granddaughter. We were excited to have another project to do. We had been rock hunting in the past and learned all about what we needed to have. I was so very disappointed with the rocks. they are not smooth at all, the are big and bulky and nothing like the picture on the box. Actually it was almost impossible to paint them or use the stencils on them. Sorry to say, but I would not recommend this product.
reviews.review_header: I was so very disappointed with the rocks

reviews.review_text: Was disappointed to see that the rocks inside were small, rough and jagged (which do not provide a good surface for painting or laying down the transfers). The ONLY saving grace is the fact that rocks are everywhere so I guess we will just go and find our own. Just bummed and feel as though it is false advertising to show these smooth rocks on the box that even look polished!?

This is not a good purchase! The rocks in the kit aren't smooth, and the transfers didn't adhere to them. We followed the directions for the transfers, and that didn't help! The paint color black was not included, and that color was needed for most designs. There were only two brushes, and they were of very poor quality. I would not recommend this kit.
reviews.review_header: I definitely would not recommend this kit!

reviews.review_text: The only good thing about this product was good delivery time. The rocks were sharp edged gravel chunks not rocks as shown. The decorations could not stick due to no flat sides. Could have gotten same gravel chunks from driveway. Very disappointing for children looking to hide rocks they decorated.

Not enough paint and the rocks were really odd shaped. Two were nice flat river rock, easy to paint, but the rest were as if I went to my gravel driveway and picked them up. The kids lost interest fast, as trying to get any type of picture on these was impossible. There should be double the paint , as the tiny tubs just don't have enough for half the amount of stones. Big let down.

Earlier this year, I created a "Summer Bucket List" for fun activities to complete with my two daughters, and rock painting was on that list. I figured I'd just grab some rocks from outside and use paint we already had, but when I saw this Creativity for Kids Rock Painting Kit, I knew it would be perfect for this Bucket List item. Since children are impatient, it's a good thing the paint can dry fairly well within a few minutes--but only if it's not too thick. Unlike just grabbing supplies you already own, this kit comes with picture transfers, like temporary tattoos, which can go over paint and/or be painted on. Unfortunately, you have to be very careful with the application or there can be smearing, or even no application at all. The rocks included are nice and smooth, but one did come chipped in a couple of spots, and apparently the paint can be damaged if the rocks bump against each other, so you have to be careful transporting them if you want to hide them in your garden or yard, or give to friends or family for gifts. The two brushes allow for different brush strokes, but some of the colors could be darker, or at least use a second or third layer of paint, but I feared messing up the designs. The paint containers open easily, but you have to push hard to snap them close and not all the colors you see on the box are available (such as black for the ladybug). And no, these are not washable paints unfortunately. On the box it also looks like the transfers have dotted lines around them to guide cutting, but they don't. Plus, the gold diamond transfer was damaged when placed face down to view the artwork on the other side of the rock. Despite shortcomings with the transfers, I will say that both my girls and I had fun coming up with designs to decorate the rocks, and we have another successful Bucket List item completed. Overall, this was still easier than gathering up all the materials on our own, so if rock painting sounds like a fun activity, this is a good kit to use.
reviews.review_header: Fun summer activity, with some sticker/transfer shortcomings

reviews.review_text: Who would have thought that a little paint and some rocks could be so much fun?!?! My daughter and niece (ages 4 & 6) entertained themselves for quite some time decorating these. Our favorite part was putting the tattoos on the rocks! Once we used all the rocks included we just grabbed more outside. Now we plan to leave them around outside for others to enjoy!

name: Shootout Basketball Arcade Game, Home Dual Shot with LED Lights and Scorer - 8-Option Interactive Indoor Basketball Hoop Game with Double Hoops, 7 Basketballs, Pump - For Room, Dorm, Basement

reviews.review_text: Somehow I thought this was some tiny, foldable little kids' thing. Holy schmoly, this is huge and great for the whole family (if you have the room). It took 3 of us 2 hours to put together. I put it together wrong and had to undo much of it to get it to go together again. I did not enjoy the installation process. But once it was together and we pumped up the 7 balls (they included a ball inflator - thank you!!), and we actually started playing, all annoyance was forgotten! Everyone in the family from ages 5-70, had a blast shooting competitive hoops together. I found myself huffing and puffing after 5-6 games because I was racing so fast to beat my husband and get the high score. Great gentle ab and arm workout. The noises it makes are just some fun beeping and bell sounds to let you know when to start and when the game is called. We get some minor cheering and a ref whistle at the end. The downside is it's huge. The gentleman in the photo is 6'3". I do not know where to store it, but for winter, it's worth taking up part of the living room. The kids set their bean bag under it and enjoy their ready made fort, and we all have a winter game to play to get some wiggles out. If you have a game room or space in the garage, the family will be stoked about this purchase. We are having SO MUCH FUN!!

Arcade quality game for the home or game room. Headboard is thick/well made, painted nicely. Double-hoop design, it has a hoop for visitors and one for home team and a net on each side. Comes with everything in the box. To assemble you get the Allen wrench and key, you just need the standard/Phillips screwdriver. In the box you get the basketballs, all the parts and electronic scorer- (takes three double A batteries.) It has 8 game modes- 'Check Point, 'Around The World' and 'Left And Right Shoot- gives different versions of games available and how to play them. You press play to enter game one, you can also select single or multiple players, you can choose your playing time 30/45/60 seconds. Scoreboard home displays Player 1 and 2 and visitor displays 3 and 4. Player with the most points wins. Scorer will turn off automatically after 15 minutes if no shot is made or no buttons are pressed. Assembly straight-forward and to the point. Can be folded and stored. Overall, well made and fun basketball arcade game.

I can't imagine anyone who wouldn't find this fun. When we assembled this we did it with our grandkids in mind and they love it but so do all the adults. What a great idea to get everyone away from the television and the phones for a while. The entire family loves time playing this arcade game and to the adults, it feels like old home week. With the 8 different games, LED scoring and the game sounds you feel like you are back in a real arcade. The two hoops are great since that means two kids can shoot at the same time and there is no yelling about whose turn it is!!! The cloth balls are sturdy and this entire unit is well made. You can collapse it to move it around but I found that I set it up and just left it in the basement for the kids to play with. It is not that heavy so you really could move it from room to room by folding or just moving it. The kids acted like it was Christmas Day with this thing and it has provided hours of enjoyment for them.
reviews.review_header: Well made and has lots of features.

reviews.review_text: This is an awesome fun pop-a-shot style basketball game. Set up is easy, and it should fit fine in a game room or rec room - although it is too big for say a child's bedroom. Once set up, you can play a variety of quick shoot basketball games. This is familiar to anyone who has played this at an arcade or bar - you have a limited time to make as many shots as possible. You can play solo or for more fun compete with a friend, both shooting at the same time. There several games programmed in and you shouldn't get bored. Note that this doesn't have the moving rims that some of the bigger arcade games do but that wasn't a big deal to me. This will definitely be used and will liven up any party.

We had noticed at the local arcade how some amusements might stand empty, but the "basketball shooting" game was always going. We were offered a sample of this product in exchange for this unbiased review. It's FUN! It folds up a little to take up a little less space - we've got it in the garage - but you COULD put it in your game room instead of an air hockey game or a billiard table. It comes with 7 little basketballs and a little air pump - it's noticeably less sturdy than the arcade-quality game, but our garage isn't an arcade. If gathering the gang for cutthroat basketball shooting sounds like a good time to you, this may be your game!
reviews.review_header: Turn your house into a free-throw party!

reviews.review_text: This Shootout Basketball Arcade Game offers hours of fun for the entire family. It comes well packed and requires some assembly. The assembly is easy. It comes with balls that also must be inflated. It comes with the inflation device. It’s easy to do. This game is well made, and sturdy. It makes sounds, and lights up with LED lights. It keeps score. We have had other basketball games, but this one is better because it has two baskets so kids can compete at the same time. You can fold it and store it, but we have found it easier to keep it up in the basement. Everyone enjoys it—kids, teens and adults.
reviews.review_header: So much family fun for kids, teens, and adults
reviews.review_author: Leah Maines, best-selling, award-winning author, actor, and editor

name: Amazon Essentials Girls' Lightweight Water-Resistant Packable Hooded Puffer Jacket

reviews.review_text: I purchased when we needed a coat quickly for my daughter and we are really happy with it. It's plenty warm for where we live in Houston, TX, even with our cold snap of temperatures around and just below freezing, but not too warm for days when the temps are in the 40s. I like that I can pack it quickly in the bag. It has come in handy a few times (easier to carry the bag on my wrist than to carry a coat around) and will be great for travel. I was very pleasantly surprised at the nice quality of the coat. It's easily just as well made as coats that are twice the price. I sew and can be particular about how things are constructed and the quality of the stitching and I found this to be well made.

These are the perfect jackets for Spring, Fall or warmer winter days. They're light weight and my kids are comfortable in them. However, I wouldn't put my kids in these if the temperature hit freezing. They wouldn't be enough to stay warm. However, they're perfect for car seats when you don't want a bulky winter coat. The quality is on par with some of the bigger names out there but at half the price! I bought Neon Flamingo Pink because I wanted something bright for a recent trip and there is no missing them in this color! They fit as expected. I would definitely recommend! We love them!
reviews.review_header: Great jacket at a great price!

reviews.review_text: ** REVIEW SIZE CHART BEFORE BUYING!** This jacket is well-made; however, the sizes are different than normal youth sizes. The XL is actually a size 12 so if you need a 14/16, get the XXL. I bought it to donate to a school so the size discrepancy is fine, but I would have been upset if I bought it for my own kids.
reviews.review_header: I bought it to donate to a school so the size discrepancy is fine, but I would have been upset if I ...

reviews.review_text: The quality of this jacket is good and my best brand comparison would be Old Navy, however, it is pretty thin and not effective for keeping a little one warm in temperatures below 50 degrees Fahrenheit. It also runs small, so size up by one to insure that it covers your kid.
reviews.review_header: Light jacket, not a puffy coat.

reviews.review_text: I purchased the Small for my 7 year old, it fit her just right, great arm length and everything but it will be something she will only use for this season. I know these jackets are supposed to fit a bit snug. Should have bought the Medium but will hold off till next season.
reviews.review_header: great arm length and everything but it will be something ...

reviews.review_text: Easy zipper action. Nice snug fit on the hood may eliminate need for a hat. Cool purple color. Almost walking coat length, so long enough to keep my daughter’s “seat” warm during recess playtime. Not too puffy, looks great. Packable feature was a must for our winter travel plans to Florida. Keep in mind, it’s a lightweight coat, so your child will need additional layers for super cold days. For comparison...I bought an Old Navy puffer coat for my daughter. It had no hood, the zipper was sub-par and lacked the fabric neck guard at the collar, while the boys version has a high quality zipper and neck guard. I’m sending back the girl’s coat to Old Navy. This is my first purchase of Amazon Essentials clothing for kids. So far I’m impressed with the price and details.

I ordered one of these for my daughter and one for my son (the boys' version) for our trip to England and Ireland. They were fantastic! They aren't waterproof, but only the very outer layer gets damp, and then it dries immediately. I also don't think they are warm enough for sub-freezing tempsbut they were perfect for the 35-45 degree climate we were in. For the price, they can't be beat!
reviews.review_header: They were fantastic! They aren't waterproof

reviews.review_text: Funny to have clothing that has a label that says Amazon, but I wouldn't trade it for anything! My daughter was dying for a puffy jacket, got this in June for her birthday (in San DIego) and has worn it non stop, not because it's cold, because she loves it!! Fits and looks great! I will deal with the fact that it's an Amazon brand, because it's fabulous!
